TopicTitle: Formula Race Car that can go 50 m/s

Articles.Content:
I've recently built some cars and I think this one deserves to be mentioned. It has the capability to drive at around 50 m/s which is 180 km h. It can stably turn at 30 m/s. Aside from that I think it looks pretty cool. When turning make sure you press w because that brings weight on front wheels which steer the car. I have a video about it too:

If you want to drive this beast too, here's the download:

https://www./?gw6dd4ve36tkaju
